solution_line_template: He needs {water_needed_per_day} gallons per day because {num_men} x {water_per_man_per_day} = <<{num_men}*{water_per_man_per_day}={water_needed_per_day}>>{water_needed_per_day}
It will take {travel_days} days of travel because {total_distance} / {boat_speed} = <<{total_distance}/{boat_speed}={travel_days}>>{travel_days}
He will need {total_water_needed} gallons of water because {travel_days} x {water_needed_per_day} = <<{travel_days}*{water_needed_per_day}={total_water_needed}>>{total_water_needed}
